Key Match Events: Ryan Rickelton hit a stunning knock of 76 runs
Patrick Kruger took four wickets in the first innings
Aiden Markram and Matthew Breetzke comfortably guided South Africa home with 14 balls to spare
Pre-Game Insights: Ireland captain Paul Stirling revealed that the players underwent sauna sessions to get used to the heat in Abu Dhabi
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa will be delighted with this victory, as this was the highest total chased down in T20Is in Abu Dhabi
Paul Stirling, the captain of Ireland, expressed pride in the team's resilience after the come-back win
The first ball of the next encounter will be at 3.30 pm GMT on 29th September 2024
Miscellaneous Highlights: Weather or field conditions affecting the match were not mentioned in the article
Ireland got off to a quick start but lost wickets at regular intervals
South Africa were off to a flier with an aggressive assault during the Powerplay
